name: Alice Johnson
description: Alice is a highly skilled frontend developer with over 5 years of experience. She specializes in React, Tailwind CSS, and UI/UX design, and has led multiple successful product redesigns for SaaS companies.

name: Bob Smith
description: Bob is a backend architect with deep knowledge of Node.js, Express, and REST API development. He has designed scalable backends for fintech applications and implemented security-first API strategies.

name: Carol Nguyen
description: Carol is proficient in both frontend and backend technologies, including React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and GraphQL. She has built several full-stack applications and is known for clean, modular code.

name: David Lee
description: David has 8 years of experience in cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. He works with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform to deploy scalable and secure systems.

name: Eva Brown
description: Eva bridges the gap between tech and business. With a background in software engineering and agile management, she leads cross-functional teams to deliver user-centered features efficiently.

name: Frank Miller
description: Frank creates intuitive and visually compelling designs. He has a strong background in Figma, Sketch, and usability testing, focusing on improving conversion rates through design.

name: Grace Kim
description: Grace ensures product quality with both manual and automated testing strategies. She is proficient in Cypress, Jest, and Selenium, and has experience setting up CI testing pipelines.

name: Henry Davis
description: Henry is responsible for application and infrastructure security. He conducts audits, penetration tests, and implements best practices in identity management, encryption, and threat mitigation.

name: Isabella Green
description: Isabella crafts clear and comprehensive documentation. From API references to onboarding guides, her work improves product usability and reduces support requests.

name: Jack Wilson
description: Jack builds data pipelines and machine learning models to extract insights from large datasets. He uses Python, Pandas, TensorFlow, and Tableau to drive data-informed decisions.
